description: The function unique_name_253 is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it directly uses the 'linkStr' parameter in the 'vertices[id].link' assignment without properly sanitizing it. This could allow an attacker to inject malicious scripts. The function also lacks proper input validation, as it does not check the type or format of the 'ids' parameter before using it, which could lead to unexpected behavior or errors.
